location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Rough Sketch of Position of Petrol Dhow’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pencil on tracing paperDimensions:202 x 325 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch map showing the existing and proposed position of petrol dhow near Mu'airidh village in Ras Al Khamah. Lettered for reference with a key at the bottom left-hand corner. Signed and dated at the bottom right-hand corner.
